text: Ni shuo:`Zhenli shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de, shui yuan xindao jiu rang ta xin ba, shui bu yuan xindao, jiu rang ta buxin ba.'Wo yi wei buyi de ren, yubeile liehuo, na liehuo de yanmu jiang longzhao tamen. Ruguo tamen (wei gan ke er) qiujiu, jiu yi yizhong shui gong tamen jieke, na zhong shui xiang liqing nayang shaozhuo ren mian, na yinliao zhen zaogao! Na guisu zhen elie!
